website_summaries.verdict: Reliable connectivity that will give you all of the channels you need on the highway straight from DirecTV.
pros: Easy to use and set up after initial installation
Uses an automatic satellite acquisition feature that will find and align to the necessary satellites on its own
Supports the use of multiple TVs
cons: DirecTV-only use limits TV service options for some people

customer_reviews.title: Signal Strenght is going to be low
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I hooked this up and the signal strength was only about 67%. This is marginal for my roof mount Wingard Sat antenna and also for my home system, but King's tech support told me this is normal for this sat dish. I had perfect conditions to receive a signal yet this is all I could get. If I had less than perfect conditions I probably would not get a high enough signal to even see the Direct TV programming. Seems like a poor design to me.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Corkill

customer_reviews.title: Still looking for answers
customer_reviews.text: Never could get my direct tv HR 54 receiver to work with King VQ4800. It locked onto satellite, showed I had signal, but nothing but free channels would display. Called for service tech from Directv, when He heard I was using the system for camping, he canceled and said he didn't know anything about that system. Still working on trying to solve the problem. No one seems to have an answer yet.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin L. Bower

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were clear and precise. I located the ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were clear and precise. I located the unit on the ground with a clear view of the southern sky, made all the connections, programed the receiver for a 18" round dish with multi switch and it worked! First time no adjustments! The picture is SD not HD but I knew that when I ordered the unit. But what the heck we're camping and roughing it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Love camping and love this
customer_reviews.text: Love camping and love this. Tip ***** for us we had to run this straight from satellite to box. Running it through the rv satellite connection wasn’t using the correct coax cable
customer_reviews.author: Carinda Butler

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Needed tech help to get it working. Needs two coax cables run from dish to swm8. picture is grainy and doesn't work with HD channels also get signal loss notice on tv screen far to often . The best thing is its easy to setup when camping, other than that I would use my $85 metal dish and aim it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Had a little trouble to start with.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up and thought there is no way there are motors in this. It is so lite. I followed the quick guide and couldn't make a connection. I called King and they had me set up in 3 minutes. Perfect customer service and great price. Wish it was HD but you can't have everything. That is Direct tvs fault. Buy it . It is good! The customer service was awesome. I have noticed that the picture Is great. It is for a camper not a home theater. Everything about this unit has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Corey mc

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX, THE UNIT WOULD NOT FIND A SIGNAL AND ON 2 SEPARATE OCCASIONS, WOULD NOT EVEN POWER UP. CUSTOMER SERVICE IS USELESS AND NON EXISTENT. THEY CAN CARE LESS ABOUT ESTABLISHING CONTACT WITH YOU. WAS MUCH EASIER TO SEND BACK. REPLACED WITH A WINEGARD CARRYOUT 3 AND FAST FORWARD 2 CAMPING SEASONS, NOT ONE ISSUE. WORKS EVERY TIME. CAN RUN 2 RECEIVERS INDEPENDENTLY. FULLY SATISFIED WITH WINEGARD. SHOULD HAVE GONE WITH IT TO START WITH BUT YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Joke
customer_reviews.text: We had a problem with hookup from day one. The second tv will not work. We are traveling and just got it hooking up and the dome stopped working completely. Can’t fine anyone that works on them. So now we have no tv. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: shirley dover

customer_reviews.title: ... couple of times while camping now and it works great! Simple to set up if you follow the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this dish a couple of times while camping now and it works great! Simple to set up if you follow the quick setup guide; exactly. The one thing you have to remember is where you are geographically. You may have to place the dish on a table before it can lock onto the signal because there is a limit on how far it can rotate up to get the signal. Using this dish gets me all of my programming (in SD) from DirecTv except for my local channels. If you are looking for a mobile satellite solution for DirecTv, this is the unit to get!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a piece of junk, bought it and the swm addition of 90 more dollars, two service techs and there service department and it never worked!!! No refund bc if we didn’t open it in their timeline for return. Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: BSuiter

customer_reviews.title: No headline.
customer_reviews.text: We had a house fire. The DirecTV technician recommended a King Satellite Antenna as a temporary solution since he could not hook our home system to the RV we moved into our front yard during reconstruction. I installed it myself. In spite of the forest around us, our signal is reliably good. We don’t have local channels on King! But that’s not an issue. We have lots cal TV on antenna. I am impressed. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Teague

customer_reviews.title: Satellite TV anywhere in North America.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and track satellite. 50 feet of cable insures that you can find a direct line to the southern sky.
customer_reviews.author: Eaglelake1

customer_reviews.title: Clear open south sky is all you need
customer_reviews.text: Used it once camping in area hard to get signal. The only fault with this is only SD but I knew that before buying but it is much easier than aiming and adjusting satellite dish. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gafleeman

customer_reviews.title: Direct TV will not activate this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had Direct TV (AT & T) out and they no longer support this. The install guy told me that DIrect TV was bought out by AT & T for the customer base. They want you to get their cellphone, so you can stream TV. Hence, if you do not already own an older receiver, they won't even activate it. DO NOT BUY THIS UNLESS YOU WANT zto Get reALLY MAD.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Steward

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: best purchase ever.... this dish is great sets up and tunes in all in under 5 minutes. Do not buy the suggested stand as this dish does not mount to it... it is a stand that you just sit this on without being able to secure it. (Winegard tripod mount)
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit 1 year ago and it has worked good. I am now 1 month out of the 1-year bumper to bumper warranty and it has failed. I contacted customer service and they want me to uninstall from the roof of my RV, ship it back to them, pay to ship, pay labor and they'll replace parts & ship back at their expense. My last dish lasted 12 years without a hitch. I am not happy about this at all !!!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Mark D Flaten

customer_reviews.title: Problematic item
customer_reviews.text: This satellite antenna will not work as described. I asked manufacture and others if this would work on my Directv receiver (Model HR44) and was told yes, no problem. After I hooked it up and it didn't work I called King and after several contact attempts they told me I needed to purchase another $110 of other items, DSWM30 and a power Inserter, after hooking all those items up it still wouldn't work, really frustrating! Stay away from this satellite, I returned it to the seller (RV Wholesale Direct) and they would not return all my money, they kept $111.00 and never explained why they didn't return the whole amount I paid. Junk Stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof?????
customer_reviews.text: We had it only a couple of hours and it got sprinkled on and stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly on any surface. You don't need to spend the extra for the stand.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for RV usage. You don't need to spend the extra for the stand. It works perfectly on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. We purchased one and after year and one month it will no longer find satellite signal. King wants $130 to repair and ups wants $170 to ship. We are responsible for shipping so that means $170 x2. Can buy a new one. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McLain

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitive to trees.
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t realize it would be so sensitive to trees and branches. We camp mostly at state or corps parks which are normally very woodsy. We hope when we get to TX for the winter that we have a better connection.
customer_reviews.author: Adaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for campers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Looks good also.
customer_reviews.author: Nutrlibs

customer_reviews.title: Light.  Easy. Portable.  Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We love ours. Very easy to use. Very easy to maintain signal. Couldnt be happier
customer_reviews.author: Beth Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: So far a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: When we first got it, it wouldn't hook up to satellite. Contacted King numerous times, and finally after 2 weeks, got someone to return my call. Dish worked for about 2 weeks then stopped working again, had to reach out to King again, and was told to return it and then they would send me a new one. Cost me $400 to buy it, and now $65 to return it in hopes that I get a new one soon. At this point I have bought it and gone almost 3 weeks with no cable. Very disappointed in the whole experience right now.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Zilonis

customer_reviews.title: works well.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on top of motorhome. Replaced failed KVH unit. This is not auto tracking obviously, but 1/3 the price of such units. Does not require separate power cable to dish, so easy for install or portable use, just coax to dish with power injector inline near receiver. Was able to reuse existing coax in my install. Recommend UC1000 accessory if you want local channels. Also worth considering mount MB700 if you want flexibility to mount it, but also use it portable. Using with H24 receiver, with UC1000 set to 18x20 3LNB in system setup.
customer_reviews.author: Deryk Hagey

customer_reviews.title: Scratched
customer_reviews.text: Received the product, got it to work, works good, except if this is supposed to be a new product, why was the entire bottom totally scratched. It actually looked like someone had previously owed this and returned it. Very pleased with the dish, just disappointed what the bottom looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Kings satellite
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced an older unit on my husbands tractor trailer, it's lighter an being automatic instead of using a remote control is great by the time he sets it up, finishes his paperwork his television is up an running with a great picture. This unit is excellent an the talk of the truck stop from other truckers.
customer_reviews.author: desertrose

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T LAST!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who lives in his travel trailer on the road. I received it in February and it is already not working. You spend this kind of money on something and you would really expect it to last more than 4 months! And of course Directv says they can't send anyone out to help because it's not a residence! That IS his residence! HUGE waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: A.W.S.O.M.E.

customer_reviews.title: only picks up 1/2 the channels no locals worked fine the 1st day
customer_reviews.text: only picks up 1/2 the channels no locals worked fine the 1st day. it sat most of the winter ,then tried using it ,now it picks up half the channels and no locals .don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: POC - don't buy
customer_reviews.text: it sort of worked for a few months and then just died. King will fix but it will cost almost as much as a new one. buyer beware. I took it apart as they instructed and the insides are worse than a kids toy, cheap plastic and poor quality design.
customer_reviews.author: SDH

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion, Worthless product and retailer!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved as a gift .By the time of our travel it was to late to return as it never worked and retailer would not refund or respond to my issue. Called manufacturer for troubleshooting. We were never able get the unit working. Mark Griffith
customer_reviews.author: mark griffith

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up. Set the handle to the north and it was locked in within 2 minutes. Had a heavy rain storm past thru the Keys. Did not lose the signal once. We have a King Dome permanently installed on top of our RV and a palm tree was blocking the Sat, Having a 8 year old King Dome already, we did not have to reconfigure the DirectTV receiver. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Eschenburg

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. No more aiming a satellite antenna for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design on coax provided
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 1 1/2 years until it broke intermittently It would only access 13 of the 32 transponders. Called tech support and the told me to change out the coax between power inserter and receiver. Walla! It worked. So I’m given them only 4 stars since the coax they provide is just poorly designed and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce F.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use with direct tv install was fast and easy. I have a H24 receiver and didn’t know which dish set up to use. Customer service was awesome they had all the correct answers and very patient with someone that was not in front of tv at the time of discussions to be able to trouble shoot while over the phone. With this receiver I had to use the 18x20 satellite setting.
customer_reviews.author: phillip burris

customer_reviews.title: Is as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The antennae was fairly easy to install and it seems to deliver a better picture than the old King in motion unit it replaced. We are using it with a Directv H24 700 receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell H

customer_reviews.title: Direct tv people are hard to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for hooked up for a couple months works great take it with us every where we go on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and compact. It works well. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and compact. It works well. I wish there was a similar antenna available that was HD compatible with Direct TV. I mounted on the roof of my motor home roof using the MB600 brackets and purchased the carry bag. I will probably purchase the tripod if I need to install it away from the motor home in order to find a clearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Only works with Dishes Wally receiver. There lowest grade reciever without dvr. Be careful. Only works with a few Direct recievers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great right out of the box!!!! Wish I would have bought this a lot sooner I have been messing with old equipment for a long time and reading about this for a long time then finally broke down and bought it, very impressed so far hooked it up pressed the button instant connection quick simple trouble free. I would recommend the tripod or mounting it some were if you are in a windy location that can move it otherwise injoy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony L Poppe

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete antenna...Beware
customer_reviews.text: DTV is discontinuing SD programming and this antenna is now useless. Shame on you DTV, King, and Amazon for not advising your customers before they make a purchase. Worst yet, the worthless antenna is still being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Make sure your SD receiver is compatible. Easy to install and mounted on our RV.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Set up with my provider Direct Tv.
customer_reviews.text: only problem is when in heavy tree cover does not pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: The unit great but DirecTV failed to tell me I could not pickup local channels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get it to pick up signals wishing I had not purchased it
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Not for HD Channels
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item and had to return it immediately as it does not work on HD Channels. Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A Savage

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my in-motion King satellite dish on my RV that ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my in-motion King satellite dish on my RV that stopped picking up signals. This one was cheaper than getting the other one fixed. You have to be parked when using it, but I never watch TV while I was driving anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good tech support
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked except the furnished Small coax cable limited the connection After replacement the unit worked as described
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My husband doesn't get aggravated trying to hook up our satellite when we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri S. Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Take your Direcct TV with you when traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Once we figured out what direction to point it towards, we were at the beach in our motor home with live TV news, shows etc. Of course we brought our receiver from home. Great portable for traveling with Direct TV. No installation. Ours rests on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: LGH TLH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy install quickly finds directv satelite. Not picky with length of cable.
customer_reviews.author: Randall leger

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty much plug and play...
customer_reviews.text: This dish has been a life saver to me as a O.T.R. truck driver... Don't buy this dish if u plan on going with Direct tv because they do not offer HD channels but if ur gonna go with Dish Network awesome product...
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Gino

customer_reviews.title: That you can use it with 200 foot of cable and still get a clear picture
customer_reviews.text: This dish has a 200 foot range so it can be used with 200 feet of cable other’s can only be used with 50 feet of cable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I started with a cheap stand and dish which was ...
customer_reviews.text: I started with a cheap stand and dish which was a pain to setup. Now I have no setup issues, but lost about 50 channels and constantly loose my picture on all channels.it died today two months old.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cardullo

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH NEW RECIEVERS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this satellite for my RV to allow for easier set up as advertised. be forewarned that this is only compatible with older receivers that were released in 2010 that you will need to pay $100 for and you only get channels 1-99. No HD channels. AT&T AND Direct TV no longer support this satellite. waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Will not work with my HD tv, direct tv technician came out to hook it up and told us it would not work! After discussing it in detail with King Quest customer service! We need a box and return label please!
customer_reviews.author: Kandis Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and when I didn’t follow the instructions tech support was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible customer service... they knowingly ship with a booster wire that doesn’t work.. The competition is much better..
customer_reviews.author: TOM KELLNER

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our camper and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took me about 1 1/2 hours to set up initially ...
customer_reviews.text: Took me about 1 1/2 hours to set up initially. After that it’s just a connect and go. Strong signal with no interruptions. Suggest you get the carrying case. Cons: Wish it was HD.
customer_reviews.author: Fidel Caballero

customer_reviews.title: I like the convenience of having our shows wherever we travel
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of having our shows wherever we travel, and easy set up. My only problem is sometimes it's hard to find a place for it to get the signals. I'm glad we did not attach it to our camper, which gives us more ability to move it to a place that can give it a more open area to find the signal.
customer_reviews.author: T. Whittlef

customer_reviews.title: Good value and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, finds satellite right away. Good value. Portable. Good product. Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: george mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Won't receive all satellites. Additional equipment didn't help. Not able to receive all my channels.
customer_reviews.author: Budman.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and is dependable for finding the satellite signal
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and is dependable for finding the satellite signal. But won't do HD which is disappointing when we are traveling. Also seems too expensive for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey Menninga

customer_reviews.title: new tv, new receiver, new dish.
customer_reviews.text: Hookups was simple. Getting everything to listen to everything else, not so simple. Once all components were coordinated went to signal strength and wham bam! 95 plus all transponders. Only took about 2 minutes to locate satellite 101. Dish is quick and efficient' Picture fuzzy thanks to Direct.
customer_reviews.author: William E.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend this!! We received the satellite TV antenna in good working order.. My husband took it and our receiver to the camper, followed the directions, and we have Direct TV in no time.. Took it to the Rockies in Colorado and didn't have any problem..
customer_reviews.author: Max/Abbey

customer_reviews.title: You need a receiver
customer_reviews.text: Very good product once you get it set up it works great
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Francisco

customer_reviews.title: and after wasting many hours trying to get a signal I finally got disgusted and set up my manual 18" dish to verify ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this and set up according to instructions, and after wasting many hours trying to get a signal I finally got disgusted and set up my manual 18" dish to verify a good signal, and the receiver was working correctly, good on both counts. Sent back for refund and purchased the Winegard and it worked great immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had it 8 months. Only used it on weekend. Stopped finding satellite. Did all the troubleshooting still doesn't work. Very disappointed. would not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and easy to use. One note, make sure you adjust your receiver settings to the appropriate type of dish. once you do that its way easy.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Webb

customer_reviews.title: DirecTV automatic dish
customer_reviews.text: When unit has a clear line of sight to the satellite unit locks onto the satellite and receives signal. The only draw back is unit must be set on something and not the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Dave N

customer_reviews.title: An upgrade to the Vuqube Flex.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Get 90%+ signal compared to 70ish signal with the vuqube flex. Homes in quickly. Appears to be a well built unit. Holding up to 1 month of RVing across the country. However, was told by King that Flex controller does not work with the Quest...not sure why. May ask down the road.
customer_reviews.author: GCV

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a refurbished which works well and the Tech. and customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the traveling hunter who can not live ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a direct tv HR 24 model receiver and it took some help from their customer service department to help get set up the first time but has worked flawlessly since then. Awesome product for the traveling hunter who can not live without his college game day:). Great product.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Direct-tv antenna .
customer_reviews.text: Waited for one of these for a long time. Finally got one and now wish I hadn't waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Turner

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product to my friends
customer_reviews.text: This is for king satellite for direct Tv. No HD. You have to buy another box from King to get local channels these channels are almost impossible to watch because of the size. I wasn’t able to figure out how to shrink the video so we could watch local channels. Forget about King customer service. Non existent. Should have stayed with King for Dish. Much better product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Bed investment
customer_reviews.text: Their phone help line was no help. Direct tv rep says our tv and receiver are great but we can’t get it to work!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item shipped to us twice.  Correct item on the outside of box, but different item in box!
customer_reviews.text: This would probably be a great item, but we have now received 2 shipments and both are the incorrect item and will not work with my HD satellite box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working well for non local stations with Direct TV
customer_reviews.text: Use on my RV. Did not realize I could not get local channels.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P Rivers

customer_reviews.title: This unit does not work with Direct TV
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this unit specifically to work with Direct TV as we travel. It does not work. I was on the phone with Direct TV for 6 hours trying to get it to work. It doesn't !!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Pannella

customer_reviews.title: Great! DirecTV anywhere and everywhere.  No hassles.  Point and Click!
customer_reviews.text: If you want portable DirecTV in your RV or at the park or anywhere you have power ... this is it. Our dish on our RV failed (wouldn't auto rotate) while on vacation. We went to the RV shop at the RV Park and they had one of these but for DISH, not DirecTV. They offered to order one but we said no. We went online to Amazon in the RV, and it showed up the next day. Plugged it in, hit "find satellite", and we were watching the Masters Golf Tournament in 5 minutes. It is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rahm

customer_reviews.title: but now works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to set up at first, but now works like a charm. Took us several days to figure out what the problem was tho.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa S.

customer_reviews.title: and he's very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: This thing works perfectly when my husband is in his fish house and needs to get the satellite in position for TV reception. This does it automatically, and he's very pleased with it. Great product and highly recommended for the big ice fishing houses or campers.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up for our lease trailer...love this product! worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Chad&Casey

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: My 4100 does not work. Love to get another 1 and try it.
customer_reviews.author: camperbeast

customer_reviews.title: Love having satellite TV in our RV!
customer_reviews.text: This satellite works great with DirectTV. It is easy to setup, very light and kept a signal even in light to medium rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J Phillips

customer_reviews.title: should have purchased one of these years ago
customer_reviews.text: should have purchased one of these years ago, much easier then going outside and turning the dish by hand
customer_reviews.author: James M Burrows

customer_reviews.title: SATELLITE TV ANTENNA
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for our travel trailer. at the house it worked great. today we will find out if it will work on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S Kaster

customer_reviews.title: Easily blocked by trees.
customer_reviews.text: Every little leaf blocks the signal. Not much good on a camper. Worked ok when I tried it on my boat. But always open sky!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Takes a few minutes to find satellite but not bad
customer_reviews.author: little joe

customer_reviews.title: they recommended sending it back
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was sent a unit that had a problem and would not find the satellite. It was very frustrating, but after speaking with King Controls, they recommended sending it back. Amazon provided a replacement in just a few days that has worked flawlessly. I previously had a King Controls VUCube, and this is a welcome step up.
customer_reviews.author: gpsguru

customer_reviews.title: As we travel in a motor home and we have ...
customer_reviews.text: As we travel in a motor home and we have direct tv at home this product made sense. Activated a receiver box and followed directions and within several minutes up and running.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great dish for the money. Mounted on roof of semi truck. Took less then a hour to install. Watching direct tv around the country. Finds satelite very quick. Awesome product!

customer_reviews.text: Once you find a clear location it's ok. The manual sucks. Setup information is poor and therein lies the problem leading to a call at customer service and hopefully a helpful representative.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy directions and hook up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy directions and hook up. Took it of the box, connected it to the receiver and a power source and within 3 minutes I was watching TV. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

product_meta.title: KING VQ4100 Quest Portable/Roof Mountable Satellite TV Antenna (for use with DIRECTV)
product_meta.description: Style:DirecTV| Color:GrayKING Quest for DIRECTV (VQ4100) is the portable satellite antenna that gives you the freedom to take your favorite DIRECTV programming with you on the road, to the great outdoors, or anywhere in between. Your KING Quest antenna is fully-automatic, and gives you access to your favorite programming. Designed to be highly portable and simple to use making set-up quick and easy. Simply power up the KING Quest through the coax cable and within minutes the antenna will automatically lock-on to the satellite signal. The KING Quest for DIRECTV makes it possible to enjoy your favorite satellite TV anywhere, anytime. KING Quest works for DIRECTV SD programming.The KING Quest is known to work with DIRECTV receiver models D10, D11,D12, H20, HR20, H21, HR21, HR22, HR23, H24 and HR24. It is not compatible with DIRECTV Ka band satellites or SWM only receivers. Made in the USA. The KING Quest antenna works with DIRECTV SD programming with the option of adding a controller accessory (purchased separately) to make the system compatible with DISH HD and BELL TV services as well. Do not move the antenna until it is scanning
feature_bullets: Portable satellite TV antenna for DIRECTV service, not compatible with SWM-only receivers
Use as either portable antenna or roof mounted (mounting feet included)
Supports multiple TV viewing with the built-in dual coaxial outputs (programming must be on the same satellite)
Powered over coaxial cable with no external power supply needed; includes 50' coax cable and power injector

specifications.Cover Included: Quick Reference Guide, 50' Coaxial Cable, KING Quest Antenna, Power Injector, Power Supply, Owner's Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars398 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
